com.notification.types

Class AcceptNotification

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.notification.Notification
      • com.notification.types.WindowNotification
        • com.notification.types.BorderLayoutNotification
          • com.notification.types.TextNotification
            • com.notification.types.AcceptNotification

  • public class AcceptNotification
extends TextNotification
    This is a Notification that will ask the user to accept of decline a certain action.

    • Method Detail

      • blockUntilReply

        public boolean blockUntilReply()
        Will wait for the user to click a button (if the Notification hides, this method will act as if the user clicked deny).
        Returns:
        the user's response

      • setWindowTheme

        public void setWindowTheme(WindowTheme theme)
        Description copied from class: WindowNotification
        Sets the theme of the WindowNotification. It is up to the subclasses how they want to interpret the "image" attribute of the theme.
        Overrides:
        setWindowTheme in class TextNotification
        Parameters:
